favourite.article: Great of reminder of joy afternoon evangelism and see souls ushered into God's kingdom. This joy only comes when you win souls for the Master.
just trying to find out what a 'sheaf' is...sung it when I was a kid but never knew what it was!
Had this old song on my mind and found your website...Awesome....
Thank you for writing this inspiring song. It soothes my soul in the morning. God bless you.
Just can't stop singing it. It is always a blessing to sing it.
This song inspires me a great deal and it reminds me of my childhood days. When we go to church and were taught how to sing from the hymnal. Thank God am a member of God's family.
indeed as joy comes in the morning, sowing in the morning too is very nice with the morning dew to soften our hearts when we are dry.
What a wonderful and comforting hymn "We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves". May God Almighty bless you for posting this hymn.
I'm a youth but find joy singing this great inspirational hymn . Thanks to my parents for bringing me to Christ.
This is a great song. It is new to me everyday. The words are very inspiring.
So good to find these old songs. They have so much meaning which the modern church is losing out on very much. I and my wife are both in our 80's. Thank the Lord.

I still love to hear and sing these old favourites...they are no more heard in our churches..But I keep singing them very often. Thank you for this album...God bless the makers. Also this brings back to my memory the intense missionary activity during my childhood...I am 81.
This song is so wonderful and thankful.
Thanks for the lovely message in this song.
